label: InspectionResultCharacteristic
comment: A property of a collection of diagnostic data, visual or technical data, obtained by a performed inspection.

objectProperties.comment: A specified method applicable to this inspection result characteristic.
The code specifying the operator, such as less than, for comparing this inspection result characteristic with one or more other characteristics.
An applicable objective observation parameter of the interpretation result for this inspection result characteristic.
Accuracy, expressed as a measure, of the measurement for this inspection result characteristic.
The measured value, expressed as text, for this inspection result characteristic.
A measured value for this inspection result characteristic.
The code specifying the quality of the result for this inspection result characteristic.
A textual description of the quality of the result for this inspection result characteristic.
A textual description of the reference level for the quality of the result for this inspection result characteristic.
The range, expressed as text, of the values of the measurements performed for this inspection result characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: A characteristic applicable to this specified inspection result.
An expected value for the inspection characteristic to be acquired by using the type of inspection applicable to this specified inspection result.
A maximum standard value for the inspection characteristic observed or measured by using the type of inspection applicable to this specified inspection result.
A minimum standard value for the inspection characteristic observed or measured by using the type of inspection applicable to this specified inspection result.
An observed value for the inspection characteristic acquired by using the type of inspection applicable to this specified inspection result.
